definition: owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)
Italy/Italian/abbr. for 意大利[Yi4 da4 li4]
to make a decision/to make up one's mind

sentences.english: In most cases, it is a good idea to include them.
sentences.chinese: 大部分情況下，把教育時間寫進去是個好主意。

sentences.english: He was supposed to give us advice, but this ideas were airy-fairy ideas.
sentences.chinese: 他應該給我們提些勸告，但他的主意都是不切實際的。

sentences.english: The Amazon River apparently changed its mind a few times in history.
sentences.chinese: 亞馬孫河已經幾度改變自己的主意了。

sentences.english: He got the idea that I should pose as an UNRRA representative.
sentences.chinese: 他想出一個主意，叫我冒充一名“聯總”代表。

sentences.english: This was a good idea, I thought.
sentences.chinese: 我自忖，這倒是個好主意。

sentences.english: Wearing sun-protective clothing is a good idea.
sentences.chinese: 穿上具有防曬的衣服是個不錯的主意。

sentences.english: XiuZhi blame hermione dont call back, XiuZhi mother to her advice.
sentences.chinese: 秀芝埋怨赫民不回電話，秀芝媽媽給她出主意。

sentences.english: I have no idea. Can you please?
Maybe the elevated highway was a bad idea.
sentences.chinese: 可能高架公路是個壞的主意。

sentences.english: Don't try to change my mind, I am resolved on it.
sentences.chinese: 甭想使我改變想法，我主意已定。

sentences.english: And I'd find a way to make Tim Duncan change his mind about playing in the Olympics.
sentences.chinese: 鄧肯，我得想個辦法讓他改變主意參加奧運會。

sentences.english: We apostle application abate alembic to pack the goods.
sentences.chinese: 我們主意用小容器包裝這批貨。

sentences.english: Anything that keeps the driver's focus more on the road is a good idea.
sentences.chinese: 任何讓司機更集中精力於道路上的東西都是好主意。

sentences.english: It's a good idea to use two of the same model with the overheads.
sentences.chinese: 用兩支和OH麥相同型號的麥克是一個不錯的主意。

definition: counting one's chickens before they are hatched
to figure out/to work out (a solution etc)/to think up/to come up with (an idea etc)
a bright idea suddenly occurs (idiom); to hit upon an inspiration/to be struck by a brainwave
